title: Prawn and mango balti
ingredients: ['1 tbsp vegetable oil', '1 onion, finely chopped', '1 red chilli, deseeded and thinly sliced', '3 tbsp balti curry paste', '225ml reduced-fat coconut milk', '2 vine-ripened tomatoes, skinned and chopped', '1 ripe medium mango, peeled, stoned and diced', '24 large raw tiger prawns, peeled and deveined (about 225g prepared weight)', '2 tbsp chopped fresh coriander']
